mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract (contract_id, nh_basic_id, mj_basic_id, ncp_basic_id, purchaser_name, purchase_quantity, purchase_unit, sales_liquidated_damages, receiving_address) VALUES (#{contractId}, #{nhBasicId}, #{mjBasicId}, #{ncpBasicId}, #{purchaserName}, #{purchaseQuantity}, #{purchaseUnit}, #{salesLiquidatedDamages}, #{receivingAddress})
mapper.select: SELECT contract_id, create_time, purchaser_name, sales_name, alipay_account, purchase_quantity, purchase_unit, purchase_price, sales_liquidated_damages, purchases_liquidated_damages, statu, receiving_address, pre_payment, pay_statu FROM contract WHERE contract_id = #{id}
SELECT 1 FROM contract WHERE contract_id = #{id} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE contract SET sales_name = #{salesName}, alipay_account = #{alipayAccount}, purchase_price = #{purchasePrice}, purchases_liquidated_damages = #{purchasesLiquidatedDamages}, pre_payment = #{prePayment} WHERE contract_id = #{contractId}
